explains: adj. 有意义的，重要的；（指眼神、姿势）意味深长的，意在言外的；浅显易懂的
wordGroup: meaningful learning 有意义的学习

sentences.en: She gave me a meaningful look.
sentences.cn: 她意味深长地看了我一眼。

sentences.en: A sentence can be divided up into meaningful segments.
sentences.cn: 一个句子可以划分成有意义的各个部分。

sentences.en: Instead of rushing at life, I wanted something more meaningful.
sentences.cn: 我不想在生活中忙忙碌碌，而想做更有意义的事。
